name: Do You Remember My Lullaby?
summary:
<Do You Remember My Lullaby?> is a non-interactive short, simple story following one woman’s day during the Christmas season. It is slice-of-life in genre, delivered in a mellow tone and a pseudo music video format with barely any dialogue.

Each scene will become accessible in the scene selector after you’ve passed through the particular scene once in normal sequence, hence no scene is available when you open it for the first time.
info:
• 中文名: 你还记得我的摇篮曲吗？
  • 开发: Freebird Games
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: R剧
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2008年
  • 官方网站: http://freebirdgames.com/games/lullaby/
